message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but that price is a little steep for me. Could you do $60?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer it to you for $90.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but I'm trying to stick to a tight budget. Would you be willing to do $75?
I can see you're really interested in this product, but I need to make a living. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, so I can offer it to you for $95.
